transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir namaste India Mart ki helpline mein aapka swagat hai bataiye sir main aapka account manager kya madad kar sakta hun.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji sir ji
Customer: Ji sir aapne connect kiya tha sir bataiye kya help kar sakta hun.
Customer: Sir ji help ye thi ye mujhe refund karana sir.
Executive: Kis chiz ka refund karana hai sir?
Customer: Sir jo maine package liya na uska refund karana.
Executive: Sir refund kyun karana hai matlab refund to possible nahi hai sir directly.
Customer: Sir main sir main apna business band kar raha hun abhi.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Main jo apna business hai wo band kar diya ji.
Executive: Nahi sir jaise hum aapko services ke bihaf pe guide kar sakte hain jo bhi aapki helpful rehta hai sir. Hum uske bihaf pe aapko sari chize guide kar sakte hain services ke matlab close karani hai sir.
Customer: Nahi sir mujhe refund hi karana sir maine band hi kar diya abhi iske nikal ke kya karunga agar main.
Executive: Ji ji. To sir services ke bihaf pe hum aapko guide kar sakte hain ki jo bhi issue aa raha hai aapko services sikha sakte hain ki kaise istemal karni hai aur sari chize aapko A to Z guide kar sakte hain sir.

Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Ji sir to services ke bihaf pe hum aapko guide kar dete hain sir kaise istemal karna hai services aur phir usse benefit milega aapko sari chizon ka. Dhandha milega sir to aapko kafi achcha benefit milega uske bihaf pe sir.
Customer: Steel wale page de de.
Executive: Hello
Customer: 12 mm ki sheet hai.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Sir dhandha to abhi bhi aap kar rahe hain sir abhi aap baat kar rahe hain baat chit kar rahe hain to business line mein hi to jude hue hain sir awaz aa rahi hai sir.
Customer: Sir ye to mera outsource business hai main usse to koi business kar hi nahi raha.
Executive: Nahi to currently jaise aap keh rahe hain ki dhandha band kar diye hain sir to hum aapko isi mein bihaf mein aapko sari chize guide kar dete hain.
Customer: Ye to mera ye jo hai na outdoor wala business hai ji ji apna matlab ki jao kahin theka milta hai to wahan chala jata hun wahan se.
Executive: Sir to hum aapko kai bar call kar chuke hain ki aapko demo provide kar de wapas se sari chize lekin aap jo hai time pe jab call hi nahi hum log ka receive karte to kahan se aapko phir se hum bata payenge sir. To agar ab aap hume time de hum aapko services ke bihaf pe sari chize phir se samjha dete hain A to Z aapko behtar dhandha milega sir India Mart ke through sir.
Customer: Business point of view se hi to open kiya hoga sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To ek bar sir bata dijiye koi time bata dijiye jis time hum aapke sath meeting kar paye.
Customer: Sir time time nahi sir sir mera sir paisa refund kara do bas.
Executive: Sir dekhiye limited time aapka khatam ho chuka hai services ka sir kafi time pura ho chuka hai sir. To isi wajah se hum aapko guide kar rahe hain ki aapko A to Z guide kar dete hain services ke bihaf pe sir taki aap services ka benefit le paye sir.
Customer: Sir service to maine bahut le li hai aur service kya lenge karun.
Executive: Sir abhi currently services aap jo hai lagbhag agar main check kar raha hun sir to lagbhag sir kabhi aapne services ka sahi se istemal hi nahi kiya hai sir. July mein hi aapne July mein aapne 37 lead consume kari hai sir khali. Uske baad sir kabhi aapne services ko dhyan se dekha hi nahi dhyan se istemal nahi kiya to sir ek mahine mein kaun sa aisa business hai jispe aapko business mil jayega kaun sa aisa dhandha hai sir jisme business aap apni dukan bhi khole honge sir to ek hi mahine mein grahak thodi na aane lage honge thoda to samay laga hoga sir. To aapne sirf July July mein services ka istemal kiya hai sir.
Executive: To aage aur bhi karte to aapko aur business milta sir aur sath mein sir aapko inquiry bhi hum har mahine kahin na kahin nau inquiry panch inquiry aath inquiry 24 inquiry diye hain jab aapne by lead ka istemal kiya tha July mein tab hum aapko 24 inquiry diye the sir aur rahi baat calls ki sir to calls bhi aapko achchi khasi aati hai. November mein agar main dekh pa raha hun to char calls teen calls aayi hain usko bhi aap miss kar diye sir.

Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Ji to sir koi time bata dijiye jis time hum aapko demo de kar sake services ke bihaf pe ek bar behtar.
Customer: Sir time nahi hai sir maine sir ek second sir jo maine business mein jo paisa lagaya na sir wo maine byaj pe leke paisa lagaya tha byaj wale ka tere takat aa raha hai shayad main to tumhare paas mein koi takat kar hi nahi raha sir.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Tum samajh nahi rahe agar tum agar tum kisi pe rent matlab ki aise paise leke kahin lagao aur tum uska pata lage tumhe kis tarike se takat doge.
Executive: Ji ji ji. To sir main aapko meri majburi nahi samajh rahe sir main to aapko ji ji sir iske bihaf se hum aapko guide kar rahe hain services ke benefit dene ke liye jaise services ka istemal karenge to aapko benefit milega aapko dhandha milega achcha khasa to is wajah se hum uske regarding aapse bol rahe hain ki aapko sari chize guide kar de sir so that aapko achcha business mil jaye ek chance to dijiye sir humne aapko kai bar call kiya service ka demo dene ke liye kai bar connect bhi kiya lekin aap humse baat hi nahi karte to hum kahan se demo de payenge sir.
Customer: Sir isko kya karega sir mujhe mera paisa refund kara do bas.
Executive: Sir jaise limited time hota hai na sir to is wajah se wo sari chize possible nahi ho pati.
Customer: Sir madam ne sir madam ne jo ye to madam hai na unhone kaha tha ki November mein tumhara paisa refund ho jayega customer care se phone kar liyo ve refund kara denge agar nahi refund karate tum illegally hi action le sakte ho us pe.
Executive: Kaun madam kahi thi sir bataiyega naam unka.
Customer: Sujata naam hai unka madam ka.
Executive: Ek minute ruk jaiye aap un unka to khair number mere paas lag hi nahi raha pata nahi unke paise phone pe khatam ho rahe hain unhone sim change kar diya hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Ek minute ruk jaiye.
Customer: Thik sir.
Customer: Ye mujhe batao kya ho raha nahi ho raha phir main legally action lene ko bhi tayar hun main ab.
Executive: Ek minute sir ruk jaiye.
Executive: Sir basically jaise yahan pe jo hai hum aapko guide kar dete hain services ke bihaf pe sir services ka benefit aapko sari chizon ka de dete hain aur services aap istemal karenge to aapko behtar business milega sir isme sir kahin na kahin.
Customer: Sir aap refund ki baat karo service ki baat na karo.
Executive: Thik hai sir main ek bar baat kar leta hun Sujata ji se iske bihaf pe phir aapko contact kar deta hun.
Customer: Haan sir jahan tak ye ho refund karao nahi to phir main sir meri jaan pechan ke sir India Mart mein hi jude hue hain ye keh rahe hain aise nahi mante to.
Executive: Main aapko Sujata ji ne kya Sujata ji ne kya commitment diya hai main ek bar check kar le raha hun phir uske baad aapko bata deta hun sir ispe update kar deta hun.
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund for the package taken.

- States business is closed.

- Claims madam said refund would be processed in November.



Resolution:

- Executive explained refund is not possible directly.

- Executive offered guidance on services.

- Executive will check with Sujata and provide update.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will contact the customer after checking with Sujata.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, services, business
